text.name: Ice Bolt Wand
text.description:
{Ice Bolt}

Adds Ice Bolt Wand spell to spellbook. Use it to cast Ice Bolt spell for free.
text.event: On your way you stumble upon a small patch of icebound terrain. In the middle of this place you see a wand, clearly emanating a magical power, stuck in the ground. You decide to grab the wand from the ice and keep it for yourself.
